fields.description: With SDK 3.3.0, and android:windowActionBar set to false in a custom theme, the actionBar is hidden. However, if you set the window backgroundColor or opacity properties before opening it, the actionBar is visible
fields.summary: Anrdoid: Setting Opacity or BackgroundColor of window causes ActionBar to appear

comments.body:
I am able to reproduce this issue with the following environment;
Pixel (7.1)
Studio 4.9.0.201705302345
Ti SDK 6.1.1.v20170623141152
Appc NPM 4.2.9
Appc CLI 6.2.1
Ti CLI 5.0.13
Alloy 1.9.11
Arrow 2.0.0
Xcode 8.2 (8C38)
Node v4.8.2
